/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image presents a panoramic view of a street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, looking up towards the sky, giving a sense of grandeur to the scene. The street is lined with lush green trees and shrubs, adding a touch of nature to the urban landscape. The sky above is a clear blue, with the sun shining brightly, casting a warm glow over the entire scene. In the distance, buildings can be seen, indicating the presence of a cityscape. The image seems to have been captured during the day, as suggested by the bright sunlight.
